startpage.heading: Sveriges Dataportal
startpage.preamble: Sveriges Dataportal is for those of you who have data to share, for those of you who already are involved in data driven development and innovation, as well as for those of you who have just begun to think about how the combined power of our data can move society forward.
startpage.seo_description: Sweden's national data portal for finding, exploring and using data from the public and private sectors
startpage.search_title_1: Search and explore data from Sweden
startpage.explore_specs: Explore specifications of information and data models
startpage.social_meta_description: Sveriges Dataportal for finding, exploring and using data from the public and private sectors

data.heading: Data & APIs
data.preamble: Data is a national resource for the development of society, industry and the public sector. It is a path to transparency, innovation and growth that benefits the entire society created by citizens, businesses and the government bodies together.

os.heading: Open Source
os.preamble: Open source significantly increases the pace of innovation as actors can co-develop, adapt and build on existing solutions.

listpage.no-articles: No articles to show at the moment

statistic.statistic-page-text: Statistics visualized on the startpage is here available in text. The statistics shows the amount of data on Sweden´s dataportal per month, top 5 organizations and categories.
statistic.statistic-page-numberofdatasets: The amount of data on Sweden´s dataportal today:
statistic.social_meta_description: The following information is also avaliable in text.

highlight.highlight-header: Sweden's data portal for increased innovation
highlight.highlight-text: Data is a national resource for the development of society, industry and the public sector. It is a path to transparency, innovation and growth that benefits the entire society created by citizens, businesses and the government bodies together.
highlight.highlight-text2: Sweden’s data portal is a hub that coordinates and makes available data for re-use provided by public, private and civil society organisations. The portal only contains information about the datasets. Data is retrieved or requested via links to the organization responsible for it.

search.search-tips-search-txt: A search can be expanded by adding an asterisk (*) at the end of the search word. This allows the search to include different endings of the current search word.
search.search-tips-filter-txt: Searching with different filters (e.g. categories and licenses) creates an AND between the filters. Searching with several options within a filter (e.g. several different formats) creates an OR between the options.
search.search-tips-searchfilter-txt: Within the filters for category, organization and format, it is possible to perform a search, e.g. it is possible to search for a special authority or municipality within the filter for organization.
search.search-tips-sort-txt1: When sorting the search result by
search.search-tips-sort-txt3: , the search term is matched by heading. When sorting by
search.search-tips-sort-txt5: , the most recently updated metadata (information about the data) is displayed first. The fact that the metadata is updated does to mean that the actual data is updated.
search.search-tips-license-txt: Licenses are rules for how data may be used, read more about

notfoundpage.heading: 404 - Page not found
notfoundpage.body: The page you requested could not be found. Hopefully one of these links can help you find the information.

datasetpage.several_links: The data has several links for download
datasetpage.several_links_header: The data resource consists of the following files
datasetpage.no_data: This data set has no data resources
datasetpage.contact-publisher: Do you have questions or comments?
datasetpage.contact-publisher-text: Contact the publishing organization for questions, comments and requests regarding the information on this page.
datasetpage.contact-publisher-text2: You can also go to the data portal

redirect.pagenotfound_header: Oops, the page could not be found!
redirect.pagenotfound-text: This may be because oppnadata.se moved to dataportal.se September 23, 2020. Hopefully these links can help you find what you were looking for.

concept_page.first_level_concepts: Concepts in the first level of terminology

explore-api-page.access-to-api-txt: The data portal provides both APIs that are fully open and those that require an API key.
explore-api-page.open-apis-txt: If the API is open you are able to directly make API calls and explore the data.
explore-api-page.api-key: APIs that require an API key
explore-api-page.api-key-txt: There are APIs that need to be unlocked with an API key to enable you to make calls and explore the amount of data. To get access to an API key you need to contact the publisher.

form.clear-confirm-text: Are you sure you want to clear the form?
form.form-continue-text: Do you wish to continue to the next step?
